name: Christopher Villaran
description: A passionate web developer who's constantly learning new skills, trying out new technologies and keeping up to date with the latest trend in the industry. Started out as a Frontend Web Developer then transitioned to being a Fullstack Web Developer with senior level knowledge on the Frontend side while having junior level skills on the Backend side while being able to gather knowledge in Software Architecture, Design Patterns, Agile Scrum and many more. Enthusiastic in taking on new and exciting challenges that will help me further progress with my career while lending a hand to companies facing said challenges.

experience.title: Fullstack Web Developer
details: Created and managed 12 custom policies in Azure AD B2C (Identity Framework) for implementing SSO across 2 major products
Implemented usage of Storybook that documented 100% of all components in the codebase
Refactored roughly 90% of Frontend codebase to follow Atomic Design which is highly recommended when using Storybook
Taked turns in presenting our team's accomplishments in sprint reviews
Lead the training for our team's 2 Fullstack Web Developer Interns on the Frontend side

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
details: Contributed roughly 40% to the development of Sugar Connect (version 2 of Collabspot Classic)
Created an end-to-end test automation with roughly 25% coverage as a proof of concept using Protractor
Continuation of responsibilities from Collabspot, as the company has been acquired by SugarCRM

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
details: Maintained 4 versions of Collabspot Classic (Collabspot for Sugar 7+, Collabspot for Sugar 6, Collabspot for Salesforce, Collabspot for Highrise)
Implemented feature requests from several users both regular and VIP (Gordon Foods, Epidemic Sound, Sanmina, etc.)

projects.name: My Resume
details: This project contains the codebase for this resume
The purpose of this project is to sharpen my skills in codebase architecture, use of Storybook, styled components, Atomic Design principles and also improve my understanding of basic UI/UX design
Technologies: TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Storybook, Emotion, Atomic Design, Figma

education.course: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
